meta.description: Optimize the allocation of mining techniques to maximize daily production of rare earth oxide under machine and pollution constraints.

sets.name: TECHNIQUES
sets.description: The mining techniques available for use.

params.name: production_rate
params.description: Daily production of rare earth oxide per square mile for each technique.

params.name: wastewater_rate
params.description: Daily production of polluted wastewater per square mile for each technique.

params.name: machine_requirement
params.description: Number of extraction machines required per square mile for each technique.

vars.name: land_allocation
vars.description: Proportion of land allocated to each mining technique.

objective.name: max_daily_production
objective.expr: sum(land_allocation[t] * production_rate[t] for t in TECHNIQUES)
objective.description: Maximize the daily production of rare earth oxide.

constraints.name: total_land_constraint
constraints.description: Total land allocated cannot exceed 100 square miles.

constraints.name: machine_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(land_allocation[t] * machine_requirement[t] for t in TECHNIQUES)
constraints.description: Total number of machines used cannot exceed 100.

constraints.name: wastewater_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(land_allocation[t] * wastewater_rate[t] for t in TECHNIQUES)
constraints.description: Total amount of polluted wastewater produced cannot exceed 90 tons daily.
